snippet: The sausages at this annex to Schaller & Weber, a venerable butcher shop on the Upper East Side, make a mockery of the buns meant to contain them.
abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Schaller’s Stube kielbasa shop and eatery in Yorkville.
lead_paragraph: The sausages at this annex to Schaller & Weber, a venerable butcher shop on the Upper East Side, make a mockery of the buns meant to contain them.

headline.main: The Hot Dogs at Schaller’s Stube in Yorkville Have Been Working Out
headline.print_headline: You’re Gonna Need a Bigger Bun
